gwt.g2d.client.graphics
Class TextMeasurer

java.lang.Object
  gwt.g2d.client.graphics.TextMeasurer

public abstract class TextMeasurer
extends java.lang.Object

Helper class for measure the size of a text in pixels.

Author:
hao1300@gmail.com, Bulatju (contributor)

Field Summary
static TextMeasurer DEFAULT_TEXT_MEASURER
          Measures the text's advance size using the font's property.
 
Method Summary
abstract  double measureTextHeight(Surface surface, java.lang.String text)
          Returns the advance height of the text in pixel when it is rendered in the given surface.
abstract  double measureTextWidth(Surface surface, java.lang.String text)
          Returns the advance width with the metrics of the text.

measureTextWidth

public abstract double measureTextWidth(Surface surface,
                                        java.lang.String text)
Returns the advance width with the metrics of the text.

Parameters:
surface - the surface where the text are to be rendered.
text - the text to be rendered.

measureTextHeight

public abstract double measureTextHeight(Surface surface,
                                         java.lang.String text)
Returns the advance height of the text in pixel when it is rendered in the given surface.

Parameters:
surface - the surface where the text are to be rendered.
text - the text to be rendered.
